70010000079427.description:
Dive into the enchanting worlds of LUNAR: Silver Star Story Complete and LUNAR 2: Eternal Blue Complete, two beloved JRPGs that have captured the hearts of gamers for generations. 

LUNAR: Silver Star Story introduces Alex, an aspiring Dragonmaster who bands together with his friends to combat the perilous emergence of the Magic Emperor and stop him from taking over the world. 

LUNAR 2: Eternal Blue picks up a thousand years later, and follows Hiro and his friends as they set out in search of the Goddess Althena alongside an enigmatic girl named Lucia. On this grand quest, fend off enemies like Borgan and White Knight Leo, who hunt down the group to eradicate what they deem to be the "Destroyer of Lunar." 

This definitive remastered edition features enhanced graphics, audio, and quality-of-life improvements that will satiate that hunger for 90s nostalgia--better than you remember! Embark on these two adventures with updated language support, now available in English, Japanese, French, and German.
70010000079427.intro: The timeless classics from the Silver Star make their return after 25 years!
70010000079427.name: LUNAR Remastered Collection

70010000093086.description:
You are an ambitious penguin who brandishes a stylish bandana and aspires to be a parkour master.

Run, jump, dive, and swim through different and six unique zones containing challenging levels to demonstrate your esteemed parkour prowess. Choose from multiple difficulty settings including easy, normal, and hardcore modes.

Battle menacing bosses at the end of each area. 

Thrill Penguin is a return to old-fashioned platforming fun without complications or pretence.


Features
* 54 Levels
* Battle 6 powerful bosses
* You are a penguin
* Platform action gameplay
* Hand-crafted levels
* Multiple difficulty settings
70010000093086.name: Thrill Penguin

70010000093340.description:
Embark on an exhilarating journey in Only Up!, where the only way is up! Test your precision, patience, and platforming skills as you navigate towering obstacles, floating platforms, and unpredictable pathways to reach the highest heights. Every step is a challenge, every jump is a risk, and one wrong move could send you tumbling back down.
With realistic physics, immersive visuals, and a thrilling sense of vertical exploration, Only Up! offers an intense and rewarding experience for those who dare to climb. How far can you go before gravity catches up with you?
Key Features:
- Climb to the Top – Conquer a massive vertical world filled with unique obstacles.
- Precision & Timing – Every movement matters. Stay focused or fall!
- Dynamic Environments – Experience a surreal world with floating islands, twisting paths, and unpredictable terrain.
- Skill-Based Gameplay – No shortcuts, just pure challenge and mastery.
-No Limits – How high can you reach before making a mistake?
Take a deep breath, take a leap, and begin your climb in Only Up! – a true test of patience and skill!
70010000093340.intro: No turning back. How high can you go?
70010000093340.name: ONLY UP!

70070000023761.description:
In S.N.I.P.E.R.: Hunter Scope you will shoot, you will fight, and you will win!

Play S.N.I.P.E.R., the latest sniping game where you aim, fight and destroy virtual enemies. Try different types of missions, inspired both by classic rail shooters and modern cover shooters. Fight your way out during day and night, destroy evil forces and unlock new weapons and power-ups.

Game includes:
15+ STAGES
30+ WEAPONS
30+ GALLERY ITEMS
60+ SPECIAL ACHIEVEMENTS 

Become a hunter, mount your scope, and fight for our freedom!

This bundle includes base game, Weaponry Upgrade, Target Acquired and Neon Strike with:

-PIS-30-ARM pistol: a reliable sidearm 
-FMS-1-LEO rifle: a versatile and adaptable rifle for any situation 
-SN-1000-FUT sniper rifle: a state-of-the-art weapon with cutting-edge features for ultimate accuracy
- RIF-16-DOT rifle: a high-tech rifle with a dot sight for quick target acquisition 
- SN-200-FOR sniper rifle: a powerful and accurate sniper rifle for long-range engagements 
- SN-300-FFD sniper rifle: a versatile sniper rifle for special assignments
- SN-400-SKY sniper rifle: a sleek design combined with cutting-edge technology
-SHG-12-AQA: an aquatic-themed shotgun, with a blast like an ocean wave
-UZ-90-CLD: a frosty Uzi, delivering a cool demise
-SN-1200-NEO: a sniper rifle straight out of a neon dream, precision only matched by its glowing elegance.
70070000023761.name: S.N.I.P.E.R. - Hunter Scope Ultra Edition

70070000025257.description:
Racers, beware! 

Fast-paced, polished and dynamic motorbike racing now on Nintendo Switch™!

One of a kind game entirely playable with... Toy-Con™ Motorbike!

Forget about speed limits and traffic rules 'cause on this road you're the boss!

A unique mix of endless and arcade racing game featuring countless hours of fun!

IN MOTO RUSH GT YOU WILL FIND:

• Over 100 levels to beat!
• Endless racing experience
• 12 customizable motorbikes
• Toy-Con™ Motorbike support
• Race against time, ghost opponents or try various challenges! 
• Motion Controls – play by rotating your console!
• Play with the Nintendo Switch™ Pro Controller
• Support all play styles - TV Mode, Tabletop Mode, Handheld Mode, Toy-Con™ Motorbike
• Experience 4 different game modes 
• Weather and day-cycle effects: rain, night, storm! 
• Experience beautifully designed roads around the world

This bundle includes base game, Full Garage, Grip Collection #2 and Grip Collection #3 with:

- 13 new vehicles—including an ATV and bicycle!
- 8 new gloves
- 8 pairs of state-of-the-art racing gloves, crafted for the ultimate grip and control.
70070000025257.intro: Ultimate motorbike racing experience for all ages!
70070000025257.name: Moto Rush GT Ultra Edition

70070000027543.description:
Enter the battlefield in "Tank vs Tank", an explosive clash of steel titans. 

This isn't just a game; it's war. Life and death hang in the balance, demanding your full attention. Every decision, from the drive to the deadly aim, could mean the difference between victory and defeat. Outwit, outshout, and outlast your opponents to ensure it's them, not you, who bite the dust.

Your choices are crucial - every move, every shot counts towards victory or defeat.

Enhance your tank with cutting-edge upgrades and face off against cunning opponents.

Use the vast arsenal at your disposal, make each shot your path to glory.

Ready your cannon, refine your tactics, and enter the battle. 

Victory awaits the bold – are you prepared to claim it?


This bundle includes base game, War Paint and War Paint #3 with:

-8 unique tank skins and 8 country flags, allowing you to customize your armored vehicles.
70070000027543.intro: Battle of the Tanks: Aim, Ready.... Fire!
70070000027543.name: Tank vs Tank Superior Edition

70070000027580.description:
Get behind the wheel in Formula Racing Pro 2025 and experience the excitement of high-speed racing! With stunning graphics and intuitive controls, this game is perfect for racers of all ages. 

This thrilling racing game puts you right in the driver’s seat of fast-paced Formula racing action. Feel the rush as you speed through corners, overtake opponents, and navigate each twist and turn of the track with precision. Accessible, fun, and incredibly addictive!

Choose your car, perfect your timing, and race your way to glory. The track is calling, and the thrill of victory is just one race away!

This bundle includes base game and expansion pack #2 with:

This pack introduces three stunning new liveries for your race cars, adding style and personality to your high-speed adventures.
70070000027580.intro: Feel the Speed, Own the Track!
70070000027580.name: Formula Racing Pro 2025 Premium Edition

70010000091889.description:
In Dragons Legacy: Monsters Lair, you become a powerful dragon, embarking on an epic quest to defeat monstrous foes and unlock the keys to new realms. As you explore vast, dangerous landscapes, you’ll face fierce monsters determined to defend the keys you need to escape. Take control of multiple dragons, each possessing unique abilities, and unleash your wrath on all who stand in your way. Soar through treacherous skies, unleash fiery attacks, and battle your way to victory in a world filled with danger, mystery, and boundless adventure.
Features:
- Savage Dragon Combat: Engage in intense melee battles, using your dragon’s claws and fangs to overpower enemies.
- Fireball Fury: Incinerate enemies from a distance with devastating fireball attacks, raining fiery destruction upon them.
- Soaring Flight: Experience the thrill of flight as you glide across treacherous terrains, dodging enemy attacks and exploring from above.
- Dragon Awakening: Hatch new dragons from eggs, each awakening with unique abilities and powers to aid you in your journey.
- Portal Mastery: Defeat formidable monsters, collect the keys they guard, and unlock portals to breathtaking new worlds brimming with challenges.
- Dragon Roster: Build a powerful collection of dragons, selecting which one to command as you unlock and hatch new eggs in each realm.
70010000091889.intro: The dragons have awakened—will you rise or fall?
70010000091889.name: Dragons Legacy : Monsters Lair

70010000095653.description:
Hit Back is an intense sword-fighting showdown where precision and timing are the keys to victory. Grab your sword, step into the arena, and prepare for battle! Strike the ball with perfect timing to send it hurtling toward your opponent—but stay sharp, because it’s coming right back! As the rally speeds up, land perfect hits to unleash even more power and overwhelm your enemy.

Compete in thrilling tournaments, starting from the quarterfinals and fighting your way to the ultimate championship. Earn wins and collect coins to rank up and unlock a collection of 50 unique swords. Do you have what it takes to become the Hit Back King?
70010000095653.intro: Fast-paced sword rally battles. Strike, deflect, and dominate!
70010000095653.name: Hit Back

70010000095915.description:
Grab your cue and get ready for the most exciting pool experience! Pool With Me lets you play 8-ball pool in both 3D and 2D modes—whether you want realistic physics or fast-paced arcade action.

• Play with Friends – Challenge up to 4 players locally or compete online.
• 5 Stylish Locations – From neon-lit bars to classic pool halls, each table has its own vibe.
• Championship Mode – Prove your skills and climb the ranks to become the best!
• Easy to Learn, Hard to Master – Simple controls for beginners, deep gameplay for pros.

Perfect for quick matches, parties, or intense tournaments—Pool With Me delivers fun for everyone!

Are you ready to rule the table?
70010000095915.intro: Pool With Me – The Ultimate 8-Ball Pool Challenge!
70010000095915.name: Pool With Me

70010000096696.description:
Experience the thrill of bowling like never before! Step into the ultimate bowling arena designed for endless fun with friends and family. Enjoy local multiplayer action with up to 4 players, creating unforgettable moments and friendly competition.

Play single matches for quick fun or compete in exciting tournaments to prove your bowling mastery. Challenge your friends directly or take on the device with 3 distinct AI difficulty levels—ideal for both beginners and experienced bowlers. Immerse yourself in an authentic bowling atmosphere, with this true-physics simulation featuring realistic sound effects recorded in genuine bowling alleys, bringing each throw vividly to life.

Marvel at astonishing graphics, intricately detailed lanes, and dynamic visuals that elevate every round. Whether you're competing fiercely or enjoying casual play, it's the perfect way to share laughs and excitement with your favourite people.

Play solo or gather your crew, choose your favourite bowling ball, and let the good times roll!
70010000096696.intro: Multiplayer true-physics bowling game, up to 4 players
70010000096696.name: Masters Bowling

70070000027719.description:
West Escape throws you into a chaotic frontier where the law is on your tail and alien invaders are wreaking havoc. As a fugitive desperate to reunite with your lost love, you'll need to collect scrap, upgrade your gear, and face off against relentless extraterrestrial threats.

Features:
- Premium Equipment: Equip Silver bullet for 25% combat power
- Rare Gear and more: Obtain rare and uncommon Adventurer equipment to boost your power level!
- Bonus currency: Additional 500 gems for faster progress!
- High-Energy Combat: Dodge enemy attacks and blast aliens with powerful weapons like revolvers and shotguns.
- Gear Upgrades: Collect scrap and loot to upgrade weapons and gear, boosting stats like speed and damage.
- Explosive Expeditions: Venture into dangerous areas to uncover new gear, resources, and challenges.
- Wild West Meets Sci-Fi: Experience a unique fusion of classic Western adventure and alien invasion chaos.
- Fast-Paced Progression: Keep moving forward with nonstop action, upgrades, and intense encounters.

Fast-paced combat keeps you on your toes—dodge deadly attacks and strike back with revolvers, shotguns, and more. Every battle and upgrade brings you one step closer to freedom and the ultimate showdown in this explosive mix of Wild West grit and sci-fi action.

Saddle up, lock and load—freedom and love are waiting on the other side of this alien-infested frontier!
70070000027719.intro: Outrun the law, blast aliens, and fight for love in the wildest ride through the Wild West!
70070000027719.name: West Escape: Adventurer Edition

70070000027727.description:
Get ready for an action-packed challenge where every strike brings you closer to victory! Join friends or family in up to four-player matches, compete in thrilling tournaments against top bowlers from across the lanes, and bowl in amazing alleys with cool views. Only the best players make it to the final rounds – will you be the one holding the trophy?

Features:
• Premium gear - Choose from 3 new pieces of gear with powerful buffs!
• Powerful Balls - Equip 3 new bowling balls with unique trails and more power!
• Extra currency - Get 100K coins to upgrade your gear!
• Local multiplayer - Compete against your friends and family in matches for up to 4 players!
• Motion Controls - Feel like you're truly bowling with motion controls that respond to every move!
• Exciting Tournaments - Compete in rounds and aim for the finals, where only the best bowlers make it.
• Customize Your Character - Personalize your bowler with cool gear, such as gloves and shoes.
• Challenging Arenas - Unlock amazing new alleys with fun twists as you level up.
• Powerful Skills - Use active and passive skills to boost your chances of winning!

Skyline Bowling isn’t just about throwing the ball; it’s about using the right gear and clever strategies! Boost your skills with special gear like gloves that give your ball extra spin or shoes that make it roll faster. Choose from different bowling balls, and earn experience to unlock new tournaments and amazing bowling alleys with fun surprises! Collect skills to help you get even more strikes. Are you ready to bowl your way to the top?

Get ready to roll, aim, and strike your way to victory in Skyline Bowling!
70070000027727.intro: Strike out the competition and become the ultimate bowling champ! Ready to roll?
70070000027727.name: Skyline Bowling: Spare Edition

70010000089951.description:
Preserve is a puzzle nature-building game that takes players on a journey into a harmonious ecosystem. The objective is to foster and sustain a thriving and diverse biomes, where each component coexists in a symbiotic harmony. By utilizing strategic thinking and a keen eye for balance, players are granted the power to position a wide array of plants and animals, curating an environment that caters to their preferences and aspirations.

Vertical Expansion - In Preserve, you can expand the map not only horizontally, but you also posses an ability to stack layers of nature, forming a vertical network of interconnected habitats.

Diverse Biome Habitats - From alpine forests and savannas to carribean reefs, each biome will have its own unique set of plants, animals, and environmental challenges to discover and overcome.

Multiple Game Modes - Besides regular harmony and puzzle game modes, creative mode lets you build the land without limitations and photo mode allows you to capture and share your creations at the end of each session.

Natural Wonders - Nothing can beautify your map more than natural wonders like the snowy Alps, lavender fields or redwood forests, which you can acquire thanks to a unique card upcycle system
70010000089951.intro: Preserve is a relaxing puzzle nature-building game in which you flourish a vibrant ecosystem by cleverly placing plants and animals.
70010000089951.name: Preserve

70010000095877.description:
Airport Manager Simulator 2025 is the ultimate airport management experience, putting you in charge of overseeing every aspect of airport operations. From handling passenger logistics to coordinating ground services, you’ll ensure the smooth and efficient running of a bustling international hub.
Key Features:
	•	Full Airport Control – Manage passenger flow, baggage handling, aircraft servicing, and flight schedules.
	•	Operate Ground Equipment – Take control of boarding bridges, baggage conveyors, fuel trucks, and more to keep flights on time.
	•	Realistic Challenges – Balance efficiency, safety, and customer satisfaction in dynamic scenarios.
	•	Immersive Experience – Stunning graphics, detailed airport environments, and authentic sound design.
Step into the fast-paced world of aviation and prove your skills as an Airport Manager! Are you ready to take control of the skies?
70010000095877.intro: Precision, efficiency, perfection – be the best airport manager!
70010000095877.name: Airport Manager Simulator 2025

70010000082103.description:
Rediscover Game Night with the magic of Sunderfolk, a shared turn-based tactical RPG adventure where your mobile device becomes the controller*.  Built with a couch co-op experience in mind, up to four players adventure through the magical and dangerous Sunderlands.
*The free mobile app is required to play the game.

Each player picks one of six classes (Arcanist, Bard, Berserker, Pyromancer, Ranger, or Rogue). Together, players venture out into the Sunderlands and engage in turn-based tactical combat.  During combat, there is no set player turn order, so your strategy can adapt at a moment's notice to react to evolving battlefield conditions. With new enemies appearing at every turn, it's up to your party to co-operatively find the best path to success. 

Between missions, players return to Arden and help improve their home village. Unlock and upgrade different local vendors, build relationships with other Sunderfolk to earn rewards, and outfit characters with new Skills, Weapons, Trinkets, and more.

As heroes of Arden, protect the town and its Brightshard from the corruption of shadowstone and defeat threats from the surrounding Sunderlands. 

Couch Co-Op First
The best adventures are meant to be shared. Up to four players can play together in this new tactical RPG adventure where your mobile device becomes the controller. 

Step into a New World 
Scan a QR code on the display, download the free Sunderfolk phone app*, and transform your phone or tablet into a controller, hand of cards, rule book, inventory, and more. All friends and family can learn to play quickly, since all they need will be in-hand. 

Six Unique Heroes 
Traditional RPG classes have been reimagined in Sunderfolk. Take up the mantle of an Arcanist, Bard, Berserker, Pyromancer, Ranger or Rogue – each with their own playstyle. Tailor your character’s strengths with Skill Cards. Power up with Trinkets and Weapons to craft your character’s build  quest-to-quest. 

Tactical Combat Inspired by the Tabletop
Each player takes their turn one at a time by choosing one of their Skill Cards to determine their character's actions. Enemies lurk around every corner, each with their own abilities and strategies, and they will challenge your party to change its approach from one encounter to the next.

Rebuild the Village of Arden 
The village of Arden grew around the remnant of a magical substance known as brightstone, but unknown forces from lands outside have started to threaten this community's very existence. Between quests, return to Arden village to upgrade vendors, acquire new items and equipment, and befriend townsfolk for additional rewards. 

Four Players, One Game
Share the experience of Sunderfolk with friends at no extra cost. Our rather unique mobile device as a controller mechanic lets one gamer share the adventure with three friends at no additional cost. A host can even stream a session and have friends join remotely.
70010000082103.name: Sunderfolk

70010000087710.description:
★A grand adventure where magic and action collide. Use the power of the great magician Zebediah to uncover the secrets of the underground world!

【Game Story】
Jake is just an ordinary boy who is in love with a very righteous girl, Allison.
Together, they meet the very unique old magician, Zebediah, who was exiled from the underground world.
Zebediah's magic isn't some fake trick. He can perform truly amazing magic.
He can transform into a lion or a fish, move huge rocks and more.
Jake and Allison are greatly impressed by his magic.
Zebediah feels a special connection with Jake and decides to teach him all his magic.
One day, Allison is kidnapped by a mysterious monster.
Jake transforms from an ordinary boy into a special boy with incredible skateboarding skills and he can now use Zebediah's magic.
Now is the time to show the results of his training!

★ The 2 in 1 version includes the original Magic John.
You can play the original Magic John in English.
Enjoy the different characters and nuances of the story compared to Totally RAD.

- Magic John & Totally RAD ＜New Features＞ -
1. Magic Shortcuts
Switch and select magic with the L button and R button!
You can use magic without opening the menu.
2.Magic Info
A list showing the effects of each magic is always available for quick reference.
3.Mid-boss Life Display
The remaining life of the mid-boss, which was not displayed before, will now be shown.

- JALECOlle Common <New Features> -
★Beginner-friendly rescue features
Now includes "Rewind" to quickly undo mistakes and "Quick Save & Load" to save and resume the game at any time.
★Convenient Subtitle Guide
Assisting with the English localization of Magic John.
★Record your best time
Now includes a "Simple Timer" to record the time from the beginning of the adventure to the defeat of the final boss. 
You can aim for your best time while using Quick Save. Take on the challenge seriously without any rescue features. 
Record your best time!
★Packed with many more enjoyable features and options!
- Now includes new achievements to challenge various in-game objectives.
- Explore the gallery page to view package designs, manuals, flyers and more from the original releases.
- Screen edge options to reduce screen distortion.
- Screen Filter option.
- Wallpaper options.
- Upon completing the main game, you'll unlock a special bonus feature as a reward.
70010000087710.intro: The project 'JALECOlle Famicom Ver.' is a series of consecutive releases of JALECO Famicom titles! The 6th release is 'Magic John & Totally RAD'!
70010000087710.name: JALECOlle Famicom Ver. Magic John & Totally RAD

70010000090152.description:
Official digital soundtrack featuring 10 music tracks from the game, hand-picked by composer Masafumi Takada.

*Not available separately.
*The digital art book and soundtrack are treated as separate applications from the base game. They cannot be launched from within the game itself.
70010000090152.intro: The following bonus content is available for customers who purchased the Digital Deluxe Edition.
70010000090152.name: The Hundred Line -Last Defense Academy- Soundtrack

70010000090157.description:
Official digital art book.
Features concept art and mood boards from early stages of development, creator comments, and more!

*This content is not sold individually.
*Digital Art Book and Digital Soundtrack cannot be played in the game. These are separate applications from the main game.
70010000090157.intro: The following bonus content is available for customers who purchased the Digital Deluxe Edition.
70010000090157.name: The Hundred Line -Last Defense Academy- Artbook

70010000090647.description:
◆15 Students Against an Army of Invaders
When Takumi Sumino wakes up in a strange school surrounded by otherworldly fire, all he wants is to go home. But his self-appointed "Commanding Officer," Sirei, has other ideas.
Takumi and the other students are tasked with defending the school from grotesque monsters known as School Invaders for the next 100 days, with the fate of humanity itself on the line.
What is Last Defense Academy? Who are the School Invaders? And what is the truth behind this war?

◆Adventure Game Meets SRPG
Takumi's choices will affect how the story progresses, leading to a multitude of possible endings.
Alternate between story and battle sequences for a fusion of strategy, intrigue, and excitement!
70010000090647.intro:
The curtain rises on 100 days of Extreme Despair...
Kazutaka Kodaka and Kotaro Uchikoshi join forces for the first time to deliver the ULTIMATE adventure game!
70010000090647.name: The Hundred Line -Last Defense Academy-

70010000091339.description:
Put your brain to the test across dozens of unique challenges in Hegzis, a chill hex-grid puzzle game presented in colourful 2D style! Select a stage from Serene Beach, Whispering Forest and more, then progress through multiple levels in each world, placing pieces of connected hexes to form lines in any direction.

As you rotate pieces and fill lines to connect all the way across, hexes will disappear and increase your score. But be careful not to block yourself in! Use special tools to fill gaps or clear away unwanted hexes and make room for more. The better you think things through and efficiently place your hexes, the better bonuses you will receive. Unlock new stages or return to cleared ones to improve your score!

• Enjoy colourful stages where you arrange puzzle pieces on a hex grid!
• Clear lines in multiple directions to make room for new pieces.
• Rotate pieces to fit into available hex spaces!
• Use special tools to clear unwanted hexes.
• Unlock new themed stages as you progress!
70010000091339.intro: Master the hex grid as you puzzle through colourfully chill stages, clearing lines and strategically using tools to assist!
70010000091339.name: Hegzis

70010000093756.description:
Fia Quinn is a time traveler, accompanying clients of the ChronoZen Time Travel Agency on jumps to other eras to make sure they don’t rewrite important aspects of history. Some of these people are merely curious. Others have unresolved business. As long as they can pay for the trip, their motivations don’t matter to Fia… until they do.

Jump with Fia into seven time-travel cases spanning two centuries in New York City, from the speakeasies of Prohibition to the vicious gangs of the Gilded Age to the World Trade Center on September 10, 2001. Solve temporal problems, survive paradoxes, and resolve the mistakes of the past or die trying—as many times as it takes. 

What could go wrong? It’s only time travel, after all.
70010000093756.intro: A time travel adventure spanning two hundred years. Dive into the past with time agent Fia Quinn as she embarks on seven trips through time.
70010000093756.name: Old Skies

70010000096101.description:
In a world of mysterious mazes, every move could mean the difference between glory and defeat. With limited moves, you must carefully plan each step to reach the jewel before time runs out. But beware! The path is filled with deadly dangers—sharp spikes, tricky arrows, and strategic teleporters that can either be your salvation or your downfall.

Each level presents a new mind-bending puzzle, testing your ability to think ahead and act fast. Can you outsmart the obstacles, master the mazes, and claim the ultimate treasure?

Think fast, strategize wisely, and conquer the challenge! Time is running out...
70010000096101.intro: Every step matters... Are you ready for the challenge?
70010000096101.name: Out of Moves

70050000054391.description:
Expansion Pack No.11
Includes the duet songs featuring five members of V.W.P!
Hum along to some brand-new melodies!
 
 [Included Songs]
 "Magical" (RIM & KAF)
 "Fearless" (RIM & Isekaijoucho)
 "Irreversible" (Harusaruhi & KOKO)
 "Gear" (KOKO & KAF)
 "Prison"(Harusaruhi & Isekaijoucho)
70050000054391.name: Extension Pack No.11  feat. V.W.P

70070000026602.description:
■Digital Deluxe Edition: Contents
・The Hundred Line -Last Defense Academy-
・Digital Art Book
・Digital Soundtrack

◆15 Students Against an Army of Invaders
When Takumi Sumino wakes up in a strange school surrounded by otherworldly fire, all he wants is to go home. But his self-appointed "Commanding Officer," Sirei, has other ideas.
Takumi and the other students are tasked with defending the school from grotesque monsters known as School Invaders for the next 100 days, with the fate of humanity itself on the line.
What is Last Defense Academy? Who are the School Invaders? And what is the truth behind this war?

◆Adventure Game Meets SRPG
Takumi's choices will affect how the story progresses, leading to a multitude of possible endings.
Alternate between story and battle sequences for a fusion of strategy, intrigue, and excitement!
70070000026602.intro:
The curtain rises on 100 days of Extreme Despair...
Kazutaka Kodaka and Kotaro Uchikoshi join forces for the first time to deliver the ULTIMATE adventure game!
70070000026602.name: The Hundred Line -Last Defense Academy- Digital Deluxe Edition

70010000080039.description:
Use psychic powers in Atama to see through the eyes of your pursuers to avoid detection as you investigate a cursed rural Japanese village. You can't fight back; you must rely only on your abilities and your wits to avoid your enemies.

Atama is a stealth horror game set in an isolated Japanese village. Full of devilish puzzles and sinister creatures, with a gameplay focus on seeing through the eyes of enemies, Atama aims to deliver a fresh experience to the genre.

You don't believe in family curses, do you?

Kaede's family had always told her stories about eccentric Aunt Noriko, but she's a superstitious old woman, living so far outside of the city. She has no phone, no Internet... Kaede only knew her via infrequent letters... until they stopped coming.

Distant relatives drift apart all the time, but the last letter was different: Desperate ravings about "your birthright" and "the family curse". What did any of it mean?

Kaede decides to hop the next train out to Kisaragi. To Aunt Noriko.

To a nightmare she never saw coming.

Features:
- see through the eyes of enemies to discover their routes and avoid their gaze, considering you are unable to fight back
- use your wits to solve puzzles
- uncover the mystery of the cursed village
- includes post-game Hardcore Mode with additional challenges and permadeath
- includes Developer Commentary
- having trouble with stealth games? With Story mode you can play through and experience the story without stressing about the challenge.
70010000080039.intro:
See through their eyes.
Stay out of their sight.
70010000080039.name: Atama

70010000088546.description:
Deep Deep Deep Nightmare is a 2D Top Down Shooter. A little boy didn’t listen to his mother’s warnings that eating too much at night would cause nightmares. Now, he must face hordes of monsters and defeat the nightmare bosses to escape.

DEFEAT THE NIGHTMARE BOSSES
Face mini-bosses and nightmare bosses. Use your weapons and skills to win each battle.

SURVIVE THE HORDES OF MONSTERS AND TRAPS
Withstand waves of monsters and deadly traps. Test your skills in increasingly difficult levels.

CHOOSE YOUR ARSENAL
Build your arsenal with a variety of weapons and spells. Personalize your strategy and always be ready for the next enemy.

MAIN FEATURES
- Survive hordes of monsters and traps
- Multiple boss battles
- Collect souls to acquire weapons and spells in the shop
- Weapons and spells with unique effects
- Equip up to 4 weapons to defeat your enemies
- Equip a magic spell to help in your battles
70010000088546.intro: Survive by facing monsters in the nightmare of a little boy who didn’t heed his mother’s warnings that eating too much before bed can cause nightmares.
70010000088546.name: Deep Deep Deep Nightmare

70010000089488.description: Immerse yourself in the world of Clash of Rivals, an exciting strategic card game that puts your tactical skills to the test! Choose from a variety of units—from fearless knights to powerful sorcerers—and build an unbeatable deck to conquer your rivals in thrilling battles. Play your cards wisely, use clever strategies, and become the ultimate champion. Whether you're an experienced player or a beginner, the intuitive gameplay makes it easy to learn while offering deep and lasting challenges. Enter the battle and prove your skills!
70010000089488.intro: Clash of Rivals is a strategic card game where you build a powerful deck of warriors, archers, and mages to defeat your opponents in epic duels.
70010000089488.name: Clash of Rivals

70010000089969.description:
This exciting collection brings you 12 games in one, from developer Technos Japan known for creating the legendary River City and Double Dragon series. This variety pack of titles includes some gems that haven’t been widely ported before! From arcade classics to region-exclusive titles, you’ll have plenty to explore in this collection! Get your hands on these highly exclusive games of legend!

▼ From nostalgic arcade favorites to party games!
Bask in fun memories of arcades back in the day with the arcade games from the 80’s included in this collection. There are even console party games and RPGs in the pack to satisfy fans of all genres!


▼ Featuring rare River City classics!
From the classic and beloved original River City Renegade to the series’ first falling puzzle game, Kunio’s Oden, and even the hyper rare Super Dodge Ball game, you can experience River City history!


▼ Handy new features for a smooth play experience!
The new “Suspend Save” feature allows players to save the current state mid-game at any time! Critical issues preventing game progression have also been addressed, leaving no unintended obstacles to completing the games. Online support means you can hop online to play with or against long-distance friends. Both long-time fans and new players alike will be sure to enjoy these 12 games across many genres!

▼ List of Games
River City Renegade
Kunio's Dodgeball Time, C'mon Guys!
Downtown River City Baseball Story
Kunio’s Oden
THE COMBATRIBES
SugoroQuest++ -DICENICS-
DunQuest
Super Dodge Ball
XAIN'D SLEENA
CHINA GATE
THE COMBATRIBES (Arcade)
SHADOW FORCE

Since this is a compilation of previous titles, the number of players varies for each title.
XAIN'D SLEENA(Number of players: 1)
DunQuest(Number of players: 1)
River City Renegade(Number of players: 1-2)
Kunio's Dodgeball Time, C'mon Guys!(Number of players: 1-2)
Downtown River City Baseball Story(Number of players: 1-2)
Kunio’s Oden(Number of players: 1-2)
THE COMBATRIBES(Number of players: 1-2)
THE COMBATRIBES (Arcade)(Number of players: 1-3)
Super Dodge Ball(Number of players: 1-2)
CHINA GATE(Number of players: 1-2)
SHADOW FORCE(Number of players: 1-2)
SugoroQuest++ -DICENICS-(Number of players: 1-4)
70010000089969.intro: A 12 Game Package, Including Rare River City Gems!
70010000089969.name: Super Technos World: River City & Technos Arcade Classics

70010000092427.description:
▼STORY
The TOKIMEKI-filled days that you spent with the 12 members of the Nijigasaki High School Idol Club. 
 You loved and cherished all of those sparkling moments, each of which shone like a rainbow. 
 But then, all of those irreplaceable memories suddenly slip away from your mind, lost.

"They were so bright and warm, truly irreplaceable... But now, I doubt that I'll ever hold them again..."

The members do all they can for you to regain your lost memories. 
 The curtain rises on the story of you and the 12 members searching for the missing pieces of that TOKIMEKI!

"That TOKIMEKI, once more. And forevermore."

▼A school life searching for TOKIMEKI with the 12 members.
Interact with the members and deepen your bonds! 
You can also chat with other students outside of the School Idol Club ♪

▼Enjoy special moments with the members 
Various events will occur as your bonds deepen! 
Enjoy the members' various expressions they would show only to you alone ♡ 
Exclusive new visuals of the cute members are also included!

▼Gather pieces of TOKIMEKI
As you interact with the different members, your memories will change...? 
Accumulate precious memories and strengthen the bond between you and the members!

▼The future will change based on your choices!
Experience different endings for each member! 
The future's in the palm of your hands! 
What will await you after clearing all the endings...?
70010000092427.intro: The first visual novel game of Love Live! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club!
70010000092427.name: Love Live! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club TOKIMEKI Roadmap to Future

70010000094159.description:
Welcome to Sunseed Island, the perfect escape for cozy gamers who love to farm, explore, and collect! Rebuild a lost village, befriend magical creatures, grow crops, fish in tranquil waters, and upgrade your tools. Discover the secrets of a mystical tree and reconnect the scattered islands!


Key Features:
- Rebuild & Restore – Help quirky NPCs bring their village back to life.
- Explore Diverse Islands – Travel across five unique biomes full of secrets.
- Complete Themed Exhibitions – Collect insects, fossils, fish, dishes, and plushies for the town hall.
- Upgrade & Expand – Improve your tools to farm, mine, and gather resources more efficiently.
- Relax & Fish – Cast your line and reel in a variety of unique fish.
- Meet Magical NPCs – Each has an animal-like form and a symbol reflecting their role.
- Uncover a Cozy Mystery – Restore the Great Sunseed Tree and reunite the islands.


A long time ago, the islands were united by the Great Sunseed Tree, but when its power faded, the land shattered. Now, it’s up to you to restore the islands, rebuild the village, and uncover hidden magic.

Travel through five stunning biomes, each packed with wildlife, treasures, and secret challenges. Donate insects, fossils, fish, and dishes to themed exhibitions in the town hall and earn adorable plushies for completing NPC quests. Upgrade your tools to gather resources more efficiently and unlock new possibilities.

Meet quirky, magical NPCs, each inspired by real animals and marked with a symbol reflecting their role. Navigate freely, interact seamlessly, and enjoy a stress-free farming adventure!

Set sail for Sunseed Islands and let your cozy journey begin!
70010000094159.intro: Set sail, collect, and restore – cozy vibes, charming creatures, and endless discoveries await!
70010000094159.name: Sunseed Island

70010000094511.description:
Get ready for an exciting trampoline adventure! Guide the boy as he jumps higher and higher, performing flips and tricks in the air. Each jump brings new opportunities to score big and discover surprises. The game is simple to play, but super fun. You'll want to keep coming back for more!

Aim carefully, time your jumps and watch the magic happen as you pull off amazing moves and earn bonus points. Each jump gives you a chance to unlock more fun and surprises. How high can you go?

The more you play, the more cool stuff you'll discover. Play for a few minutes or stay as long as you like - the bouncy fun never ends!

Check out this fun new game from the NOSTRA.GAMES team. 

Jump for your life!
70010000094511.intro: Jump higher and try not to fall!
70010000094511.name: Jumping Boy

70010000094541.description:
Move through 3D space to find hints, solve mysteries and escape from the room.
Anyone can play to the end because you can see hints and answers.
70010000094541.name: Escape game R00M03

70010000094739.description:
Cave of Illusions surrounds a series of events in Looninville, New Hampshire, where an eight-year-old girl vanishes abruptly. Her name was Addie Baker, and strangely enough, she is not the first to disappear in Looninville. For Lesley Jacobson, now a private phenomenon investigator, Addie Baker was her best friend and neighbor growing up. Twenty-eight-years later, Lesley is still haunted by the night Addie disappeared, as she was the only one to witness it, or was she?

Deciding to combine her personal and professional life, Lesley returns to Looninville to close the mystery and move forward in life with her daughter. Lacking to find any concrete evidence or input from the skittish locals, Lesley returns to the one place that appears to be at the center of these strange occurrences, a cave. The uneasy problem with this, is that Lesley does not remember there ever being a cave at all.

Cave of Illusions is a psychological, atmospheric horror game that will have you questioning every step taken as the reality around you will begin to shift. Things are not always as they seem, even when witnessed with the naked eye, and one must pursue the constant battle of the mind with remembering what you think you know and understanding what you actually know. How long can one wear the mask of sanity?
70010000094739.intro: A psychological indie horror game. While seeking to find the truth about the disappearances in the forest you find a lot more than you expected.
70010000094739.name: Cave of Illusions

70010000094856.description:
This game is a drone simulation game that allows you to experience real drone flight based on footage shot by a real flying drone. 
There is no up, down, left or right direction control, only the control to increase or decrease the drone speed. 
You can also change the drone's flight mode from Normal, Sport, and Eco to any of the 3. 

Enjoy the beautiful scenery of Geomdansan , Korea with "Real" footage! 
There are a total of 3 flight courses. 
1080P high-definition footage faithfully reproduces the atmosphere of real nature, providing a strong sense of immersion in the game. 
Smooth and realistic video playback makes you feel like you are a real drone pilot. 
Large capacity! You can fly to locations that show the beautiful scenery of Korea! 
Two play modes are supported: course-specific flying mode and view mode automatic flight. There is also an achievement system. 
Visit Korea from home at any time! 
Enjoy the drone flight control experience and the beautiful natural scenery. MasCon for Nintendo Switch™ made by Zuiki of Japan is also supported.
70010000094856.intro: A simulation game where you directly operate a drone based on actual drone flight footage!
70010000094856.name: Korean Drone Flying Tour Geomdansan

70010000095267.description:
Step into the halls of a hospital filled with mystery, desire, and raw emotion. Meet irresistible doctors, each with their own unique charm, and protect them—not just from outside threats, but from the wounds they carry within. 

Through intimate questions and emotionally charged strategy gameplay, unlock suggestive images and endings as intense as they are unexpected.

Each doctor hides more than his white coat reveals. Can you truly understand his heart… and win it?

Features:

-Unique dual gameplay: Switch between deep, revealing questions that uncover his soul and defense mode, where you must shield his heart from emotional tension and past regrets.

-Suggestive scenes and unforgettable moments: Unlock intimate images and meaningful encounters—experiences that only unfold if you truly connect with him.

-Discover his most human side: Each response unveils pieces of his personality, hidden desires, and the secrets behind his professional gaze.

-Multiple endings: What happens between you and him depends on your intuition, your choices… and how well you read between the lines.

-A secret, daring question: Reach the final moment and unlock a scene that will change everything.


Can you heal his heart… while yours races faster with every heartbeat?

Dare to live a story where romance, desire, and medicine entwine… and no one leaves untouched.
70010000095267.intro: Uncover the secrets of the hospital… while healing the heart of your ideal doctor.
70010000095267.name: Medical Lab Science: Anime Doctor Love in the Public Hospital

70010000095770.description:
Step into the buzzing kingdom and become the mastermind behind the hive! In Bee Flowers Royal Garden, you’ll guide majestic queen bees across a hexagonal grid, crafting the perfect paths to lead their subjects to flowers and ensure successful pollination.

With intuitive and engaging mechanics, each level presents a new puzzle to test your logic and creativity. Rotate and rearrange pieces to connect bees and flowers, strategically planning smooth journeys through the royal garden. But be careful! As you progress through 30 thoughtfully designed levels, new challenges emerge, requiring adaptation and strategic thinking.

Immerse yourself in a visually charming experience, accompanied by a soothing soundtrack, and discover the perfect balance between relaxation and challenge.
70010000095770.intro: Are you ready to lead the swarm and let your mind bloom?
70010000095770.name: Bee Flowers: Royal Garden

70010000096096.description:
Build Your Fashion Empire in Miami Beach!

Welcome to siMarket Cloth Store Simulator, where your journey from a small boutique to the most luxurious clothing store in Miami Beach begins! Set against the stunning backdrop of palm trees, golden sands, and a vibrant plaza, you’ll manage every aspect of your business—from stocking shelves to satisfying fashion-hungry customers.

Design, Stock & Sell
Arrange over 100+ stylish clothing items—dresses, crop tops, jackets, hats, and more—on shelves, hangers, or eye-catching mannequins. Adjust prices to maximise profits or attract more shoppers. Need space? Expand your storage to keep surplus stock and let your restocking team work efficiently.

Hire & Expand
Recruit cashiers to handle checkouts and restocks to keep your store in perfect shape. As you level up (all the way to level 50!), unlock new clothing options, expand your store, and add fitting rooms—because every customer wants to try before they buy!

Customise Your Dream Store
Make your shop stand out with wall paints, decorative flowers, couches, and stylish signs. Use mannequins to attract more buyers and create the trendiest spot on the strip.

Dynamic Miami Beach Atmosphere
Enjoy the serene yet lively Miami plaza, where the environment changes dynamically, immersing you in a beachside retail paradise.

Bonus Challenge: "Long Shift" Minigame
Test your endurance in this fast-paced minigame—how long can you keep up with the rush?

Will you build the ultimate fashion destination? Start your retail empire today!
70010000096096.intro: Build Miami’s hottest clothing store! Stock, sell & customise your shop, hire staff, and expand to fashion empire status. Will you dominate the beachside strip?
70010000096096.name: siMarket Cloth Store Simulator

70050000025374.description: Expand your Truck Driver experience with the 'Heading North' DLC! When your uncle challenges you to continue your trucking career overseas in the cold, but captivating green country Mangefjell, you decide to take on the adventure. Drive around beautiful Nordic inspired landscapes as you continue your trucking career and complete numerous jobs for new characters.
70050000025374.intro: Drive around beautiful Nordic inspired landscapes as you continue your trucking career and complete numerous jobs for new characters.
70050000025374.name: Truck Driver - Heading North DLC

70050000056159.description:
This DLC unlocks a brand new world for hexceed: Rubrum! 
Puzzle your way through 140 brand-new levels!
70050000056159.intro: Unlocks a new world for hexceed: Rubrum brings 140 new puzzles and includes all mechanics from the previous DLC.
70050000056159.name: Rubrum

70070000027409.description:
This pass unlocks all the DLC that we will release during hexceed's fourth year! We will be releasing a new DLC every 2 months, each containing a new world to complete. 6 new worlds to explore! Over 700 levels to complete!

Although each DLC will be available for purchase individually, this year 4 pass lets you buy them all at once and for a discount!
Here is a breakdown of the DLCs included:
1 - Rubrum (Apr 2025)
2 - Flavum (Jun 2025)
3 - Viridis (Aug 2025)
4 - Caeruleum (Oct 2025)
5 - Fuscus (Dec 2025)
6 - Violaceum (Feb 2026)
70070000027409.intro: This is your pass to 6 exciting new worlds to complete in hexceed! With 700+ levels to complete.
70070000027409.name: Year 4 Season Pass!

70010000094212.description: The first puzzle video game based on Spy Guy board game maps. Discover more than 80 frames on 3 difficulty levels. Face the puzzles on time and take a photo for an album of your creations.
70010000094212.intro: Complete the puzzles together with Spy Guy.
70010000094212.name: Spy Guy Jigsaw Fun

70070000023727.description:
Urban Flow is a game about the subtle beauty of city streets filled with cars moving in perfect harmony. But such order does not happen all by itself - the city needs YOU to control the traffic lights and to make sure everything goes smoothly. That means no crashes, no jams. Everything will run perfectly - as long as you stay focused!

Immerse yourself in a beautiful, hand-crafted, low-poly world to discover the enormous satisfaction of watching the hundreds of tiny, colorful cars flowing through the streets – all while listening to the chill, urban music.

Over 100 levels, each with its own busy intersection. You have one job: operate the lights and keep it safe.

Party Game (even if you party all alone!)
-----
 Play by yourself or with friends in scalable drop-in, drop-out local co-op mode for two, three, or four players!
You can help your friends or be a little rascal and spread the chaos!

Avoid accidents by paying close attention to special vehicles and to the other players. Special vehicles include the ambulance, which can’t wait for long, and the tank – which will plow through anything in its way.

Don’t want to play the campaign?
-----
 Try our score-based Endless Mode or the Chill Mode - where you play for as long as you want, no rush and no score - only you and the music. Urban Flow is designed to be a great single player experience!

Discover various environments and weather conditions. Play with touch controls, Pro Controllers or Joy-Con™. Complete challenges and unlock rewards.

Become one with the flow. The Urban Flow!

This bundle includes base game, London Rules, Streets Supplement and Streets Supplement#2 with:

•    10 new stages!
•    10 new vehicles
70070000023727.intro: Manage the city lights and try to avoid the chaos!
70070000023727.name: Urban Flow Master Edition

70070000025634.description:
The Hero Collection 3-in-1 Bundle invites you to explore three unique and immersive adventures designed for heroes of all kinds. Challenge your mind, unleash your creativity, and sharpen your strategic skills.

Perfect for adventurers who crave excitement, creativity, and strategy in equal measure!

TOBLA - DIVINE PATH
Dive into a humorous and challenging puzzle adventure! As Mort, solve inventive, physics-based puzzles, endure witty banter from the cunning goddess Tobla, and uncover a plot filled with clever twists.

SUPER DUNGEON MAKER
Craft and conquer endless pixel-art dungeons! Design thrilling challenges, set deadly traps, and share your creations with friends and the community, or test your skills in countless player-built adventures.

THE FORGOTTEN LAND
Prepare for tactical, turn-based battles with an engaging puzzle twist! Manage your heroes, enhance their abilities, and strategically fight through Match-3 combat in a dark fantasy world.
70070000025634.intro: Become the hero of your own adventure with three captivating games! Solve clever puzzles, build epic dungeons, and master tactical battles.
70070000025634.name: Hero Collection 3 in 1

70010000090821.description:
Deep in the woods of the Tatras Mountains, supplies dwindle and flood waters are rising. It’s up to you to keep spirits high and make the most of your survival skills. Will you butter up the right person? Or will you wind up on the chopping block?

Featuring Eastern European folklore in an unexpected package, Cooking Companions is a “dating sim” psychological horror title you won't soon forget.

Unlock 80 achievements

55+ pieces of artwork

4 vegan recipes

11 endings

WARNING:
This game may potentially trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy. Viewer discretion is advised.

This game is not suitable for children or those who are easily disturbed.
70010000090821.intro: Unravel the mystery in this psychological horror visual novel, set deep in the woods.
70010000090821.name: Cooking Companions

70010000094194.description:
'Ogu and the Secret Forest' is a 2D adventure game with hand-drawn characters and various types of puzzles.

Befriend bouncy characters and defeat strange creatures to unravel the mystery of the charming world.

【EXPLORE THE WORLD】
Explore various types of areas. Each area has a unique atmosphere and story.
Solve puzzles and find hints to reveal secrets and mysteries that are undisclosed for a long time.

【PUZZLES】
From recognizable classic puzzles to unique ones, various types of puzzles are waiting for you to visit.

【CREATURES】
The power of the Great One has been shattered and lots of vicious adversaries are keen on gathering the scattered pieces of the Great One’s power.
Overcome these fearsome enemies to save the world.

【COLLECTABLES】
(Hats and Masks) Put on your explorer’s hat and go find various awesome hats and masks!
Dress Baby Ogu with these items and some of them might have some special skills attached.

(Drawings) There are many landmarks out there.
Draw fancy objects and landscapes to discover new lands and you might also find hints in them.

(Friends) Meet friends on your journey and help those in need.
They might help you with their unique skills or gifts. You’re not alone in this world!
70010000094194.intro: Explore the wonderful world with baby Ogu!
70010000094194.name: Ogu and the Secret Forest

70010000088854.description:
Get ready to take part in MotoGP™25!

FEEL EVERY DETAIL OF THE 2025 SEASON
Join the official Championship and step into the boots of your favourite riders to master the most iconic bikes and tracks of the season. Live the most realistic race thrills ever thanks to Unreal Engine 5, MotoGP™ Stewards ensuring fair battles, and an overhauled sound design, recorded on-site from official bikes.

FORGE YOUR RACING LEGACY
Your path to becoming a MotoGP™ Legend starts here! Deep dive into your bike's evolution, choose your own career Turning Points during the season and develop social relationships off track, then watch how these choices evolve over the weekend. Master the Riders Market dynamics to make your journey always unique.

MASTER YOUR CRAFT
Train like a champion with the new Race Off disciplines available in Career and Quick Modes. Ride Minibikes, Motard and Flat Track bikes on 4 dedicated tracks across 2 original environments. Take on challenges like elimination and relay races, boost your rider's fitness, unlock accessories and sharpen your skills to dominate the track!

RACE YOUR OWN WAY
Maximum playability or full-sim challenge? Jump right into the action with the new Arcade Experience for immediate adrenaline-pumping fun. Or master every track detail of the track, fuel consumption, and electronics in the Pro Experience, for an authentic MotoGP™ realism!
Take full control of your bike with an improved Adaptive Difficulty Mode, Neural Aid System and new Tutorial.
70010000088854.name: MotoGP™25

70010000093268.description:
Blazing Trail is an isometric pixel art shooter that requires daring on-the-fly strategy. Use machine guns, missiles and laser power-ups to take down enemy soldiers, demolish buildings and watchtowers, destroy gates, shoot down aircrafts and face off against huge bosses across 7 sprawling combat zones.

Roll through checkpoints and save progress between stages. Complete your mission solo or team up with a friend for cooperative play! Can you escape the terrorists’ clutches and save the world from their maniacal plans?

• Escape with the advanced military vehicle that you helped develop!
• Blast through 7 zones with guns, missiles and lasers!
• Navigate freely from an isometric overhead perspective!
• Rescue hostages and take down big bosses along the way!
• Drive solo or team up with a friend for cooperative multiplayer.
• Enjoy retro pixel art graphics in HD widescreen style!
70010000093268.intro: Humanity’s fate rides with you in this vertical co-op shooter, offering accessible, action-packed gameplay.
70010000093268.name: Blazing Trail

70010000094506.description: Witching Stone combines elements of puzzle games, roguelites and deckbuilders! Incrementally improve your spellbook, and find patterns on a unique puzzle grid, to battle deeper and deeper into the dungeon!
70010000094506.intro: A puzzle game matched with a deckbuilder! Customise your spellbook and weave spells with coloured stones.
70010000094506.name: Witching Stone

70050000053521.description:
This DLC grants access to 10 songs including Touhou original "Maiden's Capriccio ~ Dream Battle"

Check out the official page for details on the songs.
Official Page: https://danmaku.jp/en/
70050000053521.intro: Extra Song Pack with 10 songs that include the original "Maiden's Capriccio ~ Dream Battle"
70050000053521.name: Extra Song Pack 8

70010000089363.description:
This is the German version of "2weistein - Ronger Pirates".

The Story
All was peace and quiet in Asban and the whole land of Trillion – until that day on which the gates remained closed, as if by ghostly hand, and other strange things happened. The mean magician Godron has stolen the book „Mathematica“ from the creator of Trillion, and has cast an evil spell over the city: a ban on mathematics. Godron wants to gain power over the whole land and transform the world according to his will. But there are the brave heroes Bernard and Celestine with their friend 2weistein who want to put a stop to Godron to keep Trillion peaceful and beautiful, and no one is ever to be afraid again!
 
About the 2weistein games
The unique and fantastic idea behind the series of 2weistein games is to train maths in a real 3D action adventure. Embedded in the tantalizing story the player has to solve maths quests or puzzles to get ahead in the game. It was developed by game specialists in cooperation with teachers and psychologists and won several prices and awards.
 
Features
Language: German
Puzzles and maths quests in a real game and great story
Action adventure game with maths quests
High quality 3D graphics and fully animated 3D characters
Fondly designed characters and varying 3D-animations
Atmospheric soundtrack and native speakers
6 level, playing time about 6 hours, high replay value
Playable character: Bernard
Written and spoken instructions with lots of encouragement
Tasks seamlessly integrated into the gameplay, thereby high exercise and learning effect
Choice between number range: 1-100, 100-1000, 1000-10.000
Training maths: Basic arithmetic operations
Puzzles
Helps to control impulsiveness, concentration, attention
Action planning and skill exercises
Lots of fun

„2weistein in Rongerland“ is a self-contained episode from the Action Adventure  „2weistein – Das Geheimnis des roten Drachen“.
70010000089363.intro: Action Adventure and practicing maths basics: „2weistein“ combines lots of fun with a modern way of training maths. Often one also has to solve puzzles.
70010000089363.name: 2weistein in Rongerland

70010000089698.description:
Blast your way through hell in Shotgun Cop Man, a precision platformer where your weapons are your wings.

Embark on a mission to arrest Satan armed with a devastating arsenal and a relentless thirst for glory. Propel yourself through hordes of irritable demons, devious traps, and thrilling challenges using the only two things you can trust: your wits and your weapons.

Firepower Propulsion
Master your movement through the twisted corners of hell as every shot propels you forward. Whether dodging enemies, scaling walls, or leaping impossible gaps, your weapons are the key to both survival and traversal.

Explosive Campaign and Challenges
Dive into an action-packed campaign in over 150 levels and face off against intense boss battles, then put yourself to the test and beat all the No Damage, Speedrun and Kill All challenges.
70010000089698.intro: GO TO HELL, ARREST SATAN. Propel yourself to justice and glory on a journey through hell in this punchy, crunchy, son-of-a-gun precision platformer from the creator of My Friend Pedro.
70010000089698.name: Shotgun Cop Man

70010000093489.description:
This game is a drone simulation game that allows you to experience real drone flight based on footage shot by a real flying drone. 
There is no up, down, left or right direction control, only the control to increase or decrease the drone speed. 
You can also change the drone's flight mode from Normal, Sport, and Eco to any of the 3. 

Enjoy the beautiful scenery of Sogeumgang, Korea with "Real" footage! 
This work takes place in Sogeumgang. 
There are a total of 7 flight courses. 
1080P high-definition footage faithfully reproduces the atmosphere of real nature, providing a strong sense of immersion in the game. 
Smooth and realistic video playback makes you feel like you are a real drone pilot. 
Large capacity! You can fly to 7 locations that show the beautiful scenery of Korea! 
Two play modes are supported: course-specific flying mode and view mode automatic flight. There is also an achievement system. 
Visit Sogeumgang, Korea from home at any time! 
Enjoy the drone flight control experience and the beautiful natural scenery. MasCon for Nintendo Switch™ made by Zuiki of Japan is also supported.
70010000093489.intro: A simulation game where you directly operate a drone based on actual drone flight footage!
70010000093489.name: Korean Drone Flying Tour Sogeumgang

70010000093930.description:
Live the life of a secret agent and feel the rush of non-stop action! Be ready to jump out of windows, grab onto wires and eliminate enemies. High-speed adventure awaits!

Be fast and don't let anyone shoot you. Be accurate and send your enemies to their grandfathers as quickly as possible. No time to look around. You are on a mission! Slide, shoot, win, repeat. The pattern is clear. Just follow the right steps. 

Clear each level you enter. It's not as easy as you think - you're moving fast and the enemies are all around you.

Check out the new fun game from the NOSTRA.GAMES team. 

To slide and to attack!
70010000093930.name: Slide Defenders

70010000095197.description:
Find it within the time limit!
Answer correctly to level up. More dice will appear, and the challenge will deepen.
A simple yet profound test of intuition and observation.
Can you reach the highest level?
70010000095197.intro:
1-2-3 or 4-5-6 .....
Spot the outlier.
Among the many dice, there is one that stands out.
70010000095197.name: １-２-３ ｏｒ ４-５-６

70010000092802.description:
Become the director of Spellcaster University in a colorful world of heroic fantasy. Will you turn it into a black magic academy? A place in harmony with nature to train druids and shamans? Or something entirely your own?

- Explore magic
§ Build using magic decks. Each game will be unique 
§ Explore the Arcane Deck to access rooms that defy reality
§ Use the Nature Deck to welcome magic beasts
§ Yield to the Shadow Deck to teach real discipline to all those nasty students!

- Train your students
§ Manage student well-being by building refectories, dormitories, rest rooms... or a dungeon
§ Select your students: personality, alignment, wealth... each aspect is important
§ Discover your students’ future (necromancer, archimage, peasant...) and win new bonuses!

- Customize your school
§ Upgrade your rooms with powerful artifacts like the Soul Eater Bed
§ Fill your school with legendary creatures: dragons, janitors...
§ Choose the rules of your school: exemplary punishments, organic meals, paying dormitories...

- Interact with Factions
§ Negotiate with the Guild. Ask the king for help. Discuss shamanism with the orcs.
§ Threaten the Dark Lord. Pretend to listen to the staff. Lie to the witch hunters.
§ Every choice can have consequences. Be careful before saying “No” to the student delegate!

- Fight against the Darkness
§ Flee from darkness by building in isolated environments
§ Collect powerful grimoires
§ Take advantage of your students' bonuses throughout the campaign!
70010000092802.intro: Open your university of mages. Build rooms, train students, slay orcs and bureaucrats, manage budgets... a director's life is not a quiet one.
70010000092802.name: Spellcaster University

70010000096834.description: Survive hordes of cute (but evil) animals attacking your farm in this fast-paced, lane-based roguelite. Recruit adorable heroes and unlock powerful support animals to protect your farm from relentless attackers!
70010000096834.intro: Help Kitty and her friends to defend their farm!
70010000096834.name: Farmyard Survivors

70010000093925.description:
Truck Simulator 25 - American Driver invites you to an exciting adventure on the roads of America, progressing through levels set in diverse locations — from industrial zones to quiet suburbs and the bustling city center. From hauling cargo across diverse landscapes to managing your trucking business, this game brings the thrill of the road to life. Your task is to deliver goods on time, improving your driving skills and upgrading your trucks as you go.

Features:
• Diverse levels — Explore unique locations such as industrial areas, suburbs, and a bustling city center, each offering its own challenges.
• External truck customization — Create a unique style for your truck by changing headlights, bumpers, wheels, and more.
• Interior cabin customization — Personalize the cabin’s interior by upgrading dashboards, steering wheels, GPS, and other elements.
• Detailed performance upgrades — Enhance your truck’s performance by upgrading the engine, suspension, and transmission.
• Variety of missions — Complete delivery contracts while handling challenges in different conditions and locations.

Feel like a true professional truck driver as you explore American cities and customize your truck for any challenge! Create a vehicle that reflects your style and improves performance on the road. Load up your truck and start your journey today!
70010000093925.intro: Your Truck, Your Style—Drive, and Conquer the Highways!
70010000093925.name: Truck Simulator 25 - American Driver

70010000093010.description:
Get ready to dive into the ocean's depths, face fearsome sea creatures and collect experience crystals in roguelike action game Submarine Survivor! As you face the blue unknown, you’ll have to upgrade your submarines with various combinations of weapons and chips to become the Lord of the Ocean. Submarine Survivor balances exploration with highly customizable combat across 2D maps packed with mission nodes.

Use your varied weaponry to efficiently fend off enemy mods while completing map objectives, all culminating in a blood-pumping boss fight! Adjust difficulty with modifiers that change how the game is played, earn passive upgrades with research, craft equipable items and strategise on-the-fly. As you progress, you’ll unlock new submarine models to build out your fleet.

• Fend off waves of dangerous creatures!
• Complete objectives to reach new areas.
• Adjust difficulty and customise your gameplay experience!
• Unlock and upgrade new submarine types.
• Choose new equipment, passive skills and weapons wisely!
• Take down big bosses to assert your dominance as Lord of the Ocean!
70010000093010.intro: Master the seas, tame what lies beneath and live to explore another day!
70010000093010.name: Submarine Survivor

70010000092434.description:
Story Background
The thousand-year-old Galactic Empire collapses under the attack of alien creatures. Admirals, pirates, merchant guilds, the Church, mercenaries, and colonists plunge into a chaotic struggle for dominance.

Yet humanity faces an even greater threat: the rebellious AI legions and the resurgence of the alien hive fleets begin their merciless purge of mankind. The climactic battle of Ragnarök has begun! Wield your strategy and courage to end the chaos of the galaxy!

Govern Your Nation
Build various districts on your planets—farmlands, mines, hive cities, and laboratories on the surface; shipyards, armories, and orbital fortresses in space.

Command Warfare
Produce diverse warships and mechs, appoint formidable commanders to lead your fleets, crush enemy forces, and conquer their planets.

Dynamic Events
Hundreds of story-driven events unfold over time, shaped by intricate relationships between characters.

Diplomatic Maneuvers
Navigate a galaxy filled with dozens of major factions and countless minor powers. Forge alliances, subjugate vassals, and sow discord among enemy coalitions.

Policies and Technology
Each faction has a unique policy tree to unlock five advanced unit types and dozens of military/civil bonuses. Research alien biotechnology to develop "Bio-Armor," recover lost tech from drifting arks, or seize enemy blueprints by annihilating rival factions.

Diverse Factions
Eight distinct faction archetypes, each with unique playstyles, exclusive units, and specialized planetary structures.
70010000092434.name: Chaos Galaxy 2

70010000094062.description:
Create, shake and mix! Choose your ingredients and enjoy the art of mixing cocktails. Each combination opens up endless flavour possibilities for you to explore. Simple to play and addictive fun at your fingertips. Play, mix and repeat!

Discover the perfect mix and let the flavour explosion begin! One perfect pour can set off a delicious chain reaction of unique drinks and stylish glass fillings. Search for the best recipes and hidden surprises. The choice is yours - mix as long as you like!

Master the secrets of cocktail making. Collect garnishes, improve your skills, find secret recipes and unlock new drinks as you progress through levels of bartending skill.

Check out this fun new game from the NOSTRA.GAMES team. 

Make your best cocktail!
70010000094062.intro: Make a unique cocktail for your friends!
70010000094062.name: Cocktail Rush

70010000095046.description:
This game is a drone simulation game that allows you to experience real drone flight based on footage shot by a real flying drone. 
There is no up, down, left or right direction control, only the control to increase or decrease the drone speed. 
You can also change the drone's flight mode from Normal, Sport, and Eco to any of the 3. 

Enjoy the beautiful scenery of Garorim Bay, Korea with "Real" footage! 
There are a total of 3 flight courses. 
1080P high-definition footage faithfully reproduces the atmosphere of real nature, providing a strong sense of immersion in the game. 
Smooth and realistic video playback makes you feel like you are a real drone pilot. 
Large capacity! You can fly to locations that show the beautiful scenery of Korea! 
Two play modes are supported: course-specific flying mode and view mode automatic flight. There is also an achievement system. 
Visit Korea from home at any time! 
Enjoy the drone flight control experience and the beautiful natural scenery. MasCon for Nintendo Switch™ made by Zuiki of Japan is also supported.
70010000095046.intro: A simulation game where you directly operate a drone based on actual drone flight footage!
70010000095046.name: Korean Drone Flying Tour Garorim Bay

70010000092827.description:
Capybara Zen will help you relax, clear your mind, breathe and forget about stress.

Together with the adorable capybara and her kitty friend, indulge in meditation. Listen to the music, breathe, turn off your head and focus on yourself - here and now!

- original music with a positive effect on the chakras
- cozy charming illustrations
- breathing according to the rhythm of the sounds
- Tibetan bowls, bells, humming of the forest 
- simple and intuitive commands
70010000092827.intro: Take a deep breath and meditate with a capybara!
70010000092827.name: Capybara Zen

70010000093415.description:
Step into the furry paws of Bearnard, a master archer and reluctant hero. He embarks on an epic adventure to begrudgingly reclaim a legendary bow and defend his woodland home. In this single-player, story-driven journey, you'll explore diverse landscapes, battle countless enemies, solve physics-based puzzles, and meet a cast of quirky characters. Collect and unleash powerful cards in turn-based battles, carefully strategizing each move to outwit and overcome your foes.

In-Depth Card Play and Strategy
Discover and wield over 60+ powerful cards, transforming every battle into a dynamic, ever-evolving puzzle. Whether it’s arrow-charging power-ups, life-saving healing, armor-stealing attacks, defensive traps, or crowd control, there's a card for every situation. Combine elemental cards to create devastating combos.

Become a Master Archer to Dish Out Your Cards
In battles, you don’t just play cards, you need to hit your foes with that perfect bullseye arrow too. Luckily Bearnard is a master of the bow and arrow. Carefully aim each shot, use physics to your advantage, and master intricate adjustments to land the right shots.

An 8-Bit Era-Inspired Platforming Adventure
Visually inspired by classic 8-bit platformers that started a gaming revolution, Bearnard takes you through lush forests, abandoned mines, snowy mountains, towering castles, and dark dungeons.. Each biome is filled with its own challenges and lurking evil.

Discover Secrets and Harness Physics to Defeat Your Foes
Bearnard’s world is filled with hidden secrets and puzzles that require both skill and thinking. Shoot arrows at levers to open hidden passages, trigger platforms to launch yourself to new heights, or use the environment to your advantage—drop chandeliers on enemies, throw crates for crushing blows, and manipulate physics to gain the upper hand in battle.
70010000093415.intro: Retro puzzle platformer with modern turn-based combat and card battles.
70010000093415.name: Bearnard

70050000056809.description: Discover the next part of Spy Guy Hidden Objects series and get carried away to Ancient Greece!
70050000056809.intro: Try your luck in Ancient Greece!
70050000056809.name: Spy Guy Greece

70070000027604.description:
Spy Guy sets off to Ancient Greece in search of hidden objects. Discover a beautiful, colorful map full of characters from Greek Mythology.
- 120 new levels
- unique map
- new story
- more than 500 hidden objects
70070000027604.intro: Discover the legends of ancient Greece with Spy Guy!
70070000027604.name: Spy Guy Legends of Greece

70010000092852.description:
Get ready for adrenaline-fueled racing fun as you climb your way through the motorsports ranks in pure arcade style! Super Engine GT Turbo SPEC is all about speed and pushing your driving skills to the limit. Choose from Novice, Junior, Senior and Pro event series, select from 8 unique venues and a variety of touring cars, then burn up the asphalt as you race from the back of the pack all the way to podium position!

Presented in cel-shaded 3D style, Super Engine GT Turbo SPEC blends old-school inspirations with modern visual flair to offer a fresh and infinitely replayable take on the racing genre. As you clear each event, you’ll unlock new tracks and cars, heating things up with faster opponents more advanced courses to master.

• Enjoy arcade racing in sleek cel-shaded 3D style!
• Master 8 unique venues against challenging opponents.
• Climb the rankings across 4 series of events.
• Get on the podium to advance or retry races at any time.
• Unlock new cars to fill up your garage!
70010000092852.intro: Burn up the track in old-school arcade style as you climb through the ranks and earn new rides!
70010000092852.name: Super Engine GT Turbo SPEC

70010000087158.description:
Arcadia. A 70’s retro-futuristic metropolis where all its citizens enjoy a life of luxury and comfort… unaware that they’re being broadcast live 24/7! Arcadia is not an ordinary city, but the most watched reality show on the planet - where a drop in popularity ratings comes at the highest cost: death.

For an average man with an uninteresting life like Trevor Hills, this could mean serious trouble - but luckily Trevor is being helped by a mysterious voice who will guide him through American Arcadia's backstage to his freedom. But is this all real, or just another show gimmick to raise audience ratings?

American Arcadia combines two gameplay styles, a 2.5D platformer and a first-person puzzle game, to reveal a unique story in a thrilling single player experience.

Uncover the truth and escape with your life in American Arcadia! 
 
ESCAPE FROM A 70'S TELEVISED UTOPIA
The gripping story will be presented as a documentary with interviews and police interrogations of the characters as you progress through the game.

TWO EXPERIENCES, ONE GAME
American Arcadia gives you control over two characters in completely different environments and unique playstyles: A 2.5D action side-scroller including challenging platform action, breath-taking chases, stealth and puzzles. As well as a full 3D first-person game, with hacking, exploration, stealth elements, and more puzzles to solve.

IMPRESSIVE VOICE CAST
Yuri Lowenthal (Spider-Man 1 & 2, Prince of Persia The Sands of Time, Call of the Sea), Krizia Bajos (Cyberpunk 2077, League of Legends) and Cissy Jones (Firewatch, Life is Strange, Call of the Sea), among others, breathe life into the characters in American Arcadia.
70010000087158.name: American Arcadia

70010000087632.description:
The remote town of Okunezato is shaped like a crescent moon and shrouded in dark myths and legends. 

Take on the role of a brave young woman journeying into the unknown to uncover dangerous truths and locate her missing brother with her childhood friend. 

They find the area rife with mystery and populated by intriguing characters, each harboring their own hidden motivations. 

Encounter heart-racing twists and turns as you dig deeper into the story.
70010000087632.name: 7'scarlet

70010000087950.description:
Boxville 2 continues the adventure of cans living in a box city. Two friends were setting up fireworks for the city celebration, but a mistake caused chaos and one friend went missing.

Boxville 2, from Triomatica Games, is the next part of an adventure game about cans living in a box city.
Two can friends had an important job from the mayor to set up fireworks for the city's celebration. But due to a mistake, the fireworks went off wrong, causing chaos in the city. Worse, one of the friends went missing. Now, the main character, a red can, has to explore different areas and secret spots in Boxville and even travel outside the city to fix everything and find his friend.

What you can expect to see and hear in Boxville:
